com.crawljax.core.plugin

Interface PreCrawlingPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Plugin

    public interface PreCrawlingPlugin
extends Plugin
    Plugin type that is called before the crawling starts and before the initial URL has been loaded. This kind of plugins can be used to do for example 'once in a crawlsession' operations like logging in a web application or reset the database to a 'clean' state. The argument offered to the Plugin is a the current running instance of EmbeddedBrowser.
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    dannyroest@gmail.com (Danny Roest)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void preCrawling(EmbeddedBrowser browser)
      Method that is called before Crawljax loads the initial url and before the core starts crawling.

    • Method Detail

      • preCrawling

        void preCrawling(EmbeddedBrowser browser)
        Method that is called before Crawljax loads the initial url and before the core starts crawling. Warning the instance of the browser offered is not a clone but the current and after wards used browser instance, changes and operations may cause 'strange' behaviour.
        Parameters:
        browser - the current browser loaded with the initial url
